@Ohjeah you can add a line here with the install instructions.

``` yaml
script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
```

Note that when the software uses setuptools we add the extra args `--single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt` to ensure the installed files play nice with external packaging tools.
